member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Creator.CreatorModule.BecomeACreatorAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sends an asynchronous request to the backend to become a creator
member.param: A token to cancel the operation.
member.returns: FirebaseCreatorSignupResponseData.message = "Success" OR "Brand name already exists" OR "User is already enrolled in Creator Program" OR "Invalid BrandName";
